column2: MD940 WORCESTER SHRUB HILL TO SHELWICK JN

column5: Single LineAt Hereford the signaller has to see or be advised bythe driver or station staff that a train in classes 0, 4,6, 7 and 8 coming from the Ledbury direction iscomplete with a tail lamp before another train can beaccepted from the Leominster or Ledbury directions.Also, a train cannot pass Shelwick Jn towardsLedbury until confirmation that the previous Downtrain in classes 0, 4, 6, 7, 8 arrived complete.At Ledbury the signaller has to be advised by use ofthe ‘train arrived complete button’ at the station thatany train coming from the Hereford direction iscomplete with a tail lamp before another train can beaccepted from or sent towards the Hereforddirection.
